summary.span: 命名空间包含用于将电子邮件发送到简单邮件传输协议 (SMTP) 服务器进行传送的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes used to send electronic mail to a Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) server for delivery.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一封电子邮件的内容。The class represents the content of a mail message. 类传输到你指定用于邮件传送 SMTP 主机的电子邮件。The class transmits email to the SMTP host that you designate for mail delivery. 你可以创建使用邮件附件类。You can create mail attachments using the class.
